name: Classic Movie - Which one is NOT their movie? Quiz | Movies | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which of these movies did NOT feature James Stewart?
questions.correct: The Heart is a Lonely Hunter
questions.explanation:
The Heart is a Lonely Hunter.

	'Heart' starred Alan Arkin.

questions.text: Which of these movies did NOT feature Marlon Brando?
questions.explanation:
The Pawnbroker.

	The 'Pawnbroker ' was Rod Steiger.

questions.text: Which of these movies did NOT feature Kirk Douglas?
options: The Strange Love of Martha Ivers

questions.text: Which of these movies did NOT feature Burt Lancaster?
questions.explanation:
Ice Station Zebra.

	'Zebra' had an all-star cast - but no Burt.

questions.text: Which of these movies did NOT feature Steve McQueen?
questions.explanation:
A Thousand Clowns.

	'Clowns' was with Jason Robards.

questions.text: Which of these movies did NOT feature Spencer Tracy?
questions.explanation:
Written on the Wind.

	'Wind' starred Rock Hudson and Robert Stack.

questions.text: Which of these movies did NOT feature Frank Sinatra?
questions.explanation:
Cape Fear.

	'Fear' starred Robert Mitchum and Gregory Peck.

questions.text: Which of these movies did NOT feature James Garner?
questions.explanation:
Starting Over.

	This was a Burt Reynolds comedy.

questions.text: Which of these movies did NOT feature Gary Cooper?
questions.explanation:
Good Neighbor Sam.

	Jack Lemmon was 'Sam'.

questions.text: Which of these movies did NOT feature Richard Burton?
questions.correct: Who Is Harry Kellerman and Why Is He Saying Those Terrible Things About Me?
questions.explanation:
Who Is Harry Kellerman and Why Is He Saying Those Terrible Things About Me?.

	Dustin Hoffman was the star in 'Harry'.
